title: Starmer and Macron discuss 'one in, one out' deal to send some migrants back to France
description: The deal could see the UK returning some small boat migrants to France, with France sending other asylum seekers to the UK in return.
content:
'One in, out' deal would begin with 50 migrants sent back a week
Henry Zeffman
Chief political correspondent
Today is the end of President Macron’s three day state visit, and — probably — the start of a new phase in efforts to confront the small boat... [684 chars]

title: A pub a day to close this year, industry body warns as it calls for cut to tax burden
description: According to the British Beer and Pub Association (BBPA), an estimated 378 venues are set to shutter across England, Wales, and Scotland, leading to more than 5,600 job losses.
content:
An industry body has warned that the equivalent of more than one pub a day is set to close across Great Britain this year.
According to the British Beer and Pub Association (BBPA), an estimated 378 venues will shut down across England, Wales and Scot... [1975 chars]

title: Deadly new Russian drone attack reported on Kyiv
description: At least two people are killed and 13 injured, with fires burning across Ukraine's capital, local officials say.
content:
Ukraine's capital Kyiv is again under a massive overnight Russian drone attack, local officials say, with at least two people reported killed and 13 injured, and fires burning across the city.
Authorities in Kyiv say drone wreckage hit the roof of a ... [453 chars]

title: Discovery of ancient riverbeds suggests Mars once wetter than thought
description: Scientists spot traces of 10,000 miles of rivers in area where many believed ‘there wasn’t any evidence for water’
content:
Thousands of miles of ancient riverbeds have been discovered in the heavily cratered southern highlands of Mars, suggesting the red planet was once a far wetter world than scientists thought.
Researchers spotted geological traces of nearly 10,000 mil... [3160 chars]

title: Mbappé gets stuck in Dembélé’s shadow in Real Madrid’s shapeless shambles
description: PSG’s Club World Cup demolition was further proof that perhaps Real Madrid signed the wrong French forward
content: The first drinks break was unplanned. It came six minutes ahead of schedule, but Real Madrid were grateful for the respite. They wandered to the touchline, dazed and confused, and reached for the water bottles. They looked to Xabi Alonso and hoped fo... [5326 chars]
